text: (26/01/2024) price has increased by $0.20. Excellent bean curd! Smooth and nice. Ask for less sugar for healthier choice. Seller is also very friend and nice. Price ok. Worth the try.
Nice cold bean curd but overpriced, one bowl $2. Rather buy Laoban though.
The bean curd and soya milk has a burnt taste. Too sweet.
The bean curd was smooth and good. They served a variety of bean curd desserts and has the options to add extra ingredients like pearls...

Short hair lady sat outside the store and got up to serve me. Had a total look of unwillingness as though I had disturbed her. When I asked to take away, she poured away about 1 inch of the drink before placing it into the sealing machine! Feel extremely short-changed but anyway the soya bean drink had a bitter taste to it and I had to discard it after a few sips. Waste my money.
